title.description: The title of the bulletpoints. This is the first header element in the pageview.

order.description: The order number in the complete list of key features.

headerText.description: The sub title of the bulletpoints. This text is shown after the title.

footerText.description: The footer text of the bulletpoints. This text is shown after the enumeration of the bulletpoints.

elements.description: The bulletpoint. Each element of the list has to be specified as one bulletpoint (element).
